callout.text: NEW! Francine's Reverse-A-Balls are mixing up all the words on Earth! Hey You Guys!
Miss an episode on Television? Watch FULL EPISODES here!
Watch clips of Marcus and Jessica on Prankster Planet, and then help them save the day!
BRAND NEW! Prankster Planet episodes! Save the world from Francine's evil plans on Prankster Planet!
NEW! Play Basketball Battle and win volts for your favorite character!
NEW! Play Sandwich Stacker and win volts for your favorite character!
NEW! Play a new What's the Story: Commercial 2!

thumb.rollCopy: The Electric Company has the coolest wallpapers for your computer screen! Click on the right size for your screen and show off your wallpaper to all of your friends.
Discover the Lost Guide to Pranskter Planet! Save all the words in the world, meet Manny's robots, and try Secret Prankster Recipes!
Want more of The Electric Company? You can PRINT out a door hanger, trading cards with cast photos, and even a bookmark to use with your favorite book!
Download this exciting driving game and grab a friend or grown up. Whether you're the driver or passenger, you'll need to work together to collect and unscramble words!

games.game: Combotronic: ing Combotronic: short i Combotronic: dr Combotronic: tr --> Combotronic: ai Combotronic: s Combotronic: ight Combotronic: short u Combotronic: c Combotronic: st

Chain Game: sh Chain Game: ld/lt Chain Game: fr Chain Game: tr/dr Chain Game: cr Chain Game: short a --> Chain Game: ou Chain Game: mp Chain Game: fl Chain Game: gr Chain Game: short u Chain Game: short e Chain Game: st

gal.copy: The cast of The Electric Company shares super secret information about what happens while they make the TV show!
Get to know the stars of The Electric Company!
See some of the goofs and do-overs that happen on The Electric Company!
What Inspires you? Watch these stories about how to use the power of words to express your creativity.
Are you an artist, a dancer, a writer, a builder, a musician? See how people like you use their skills to make The Electric Company!
The cast of The Electric Company get behind the camera, and show us the fun they have while making the show!
See of all your favorite songs from the show!
Check out these videos of Shock and his friends making beats, rhymes, and songs!
Which is your favorite Electric Company animation? Check out these videos and decide!
Have all sorts of fun breaking down and building up words!
Find your favorite Electric Company member moments, and Prankster pranks from the shows you love the most!
